definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1Sa 6:4 mouse (NH id.; Aram. [[עַכְבְּרָא]]; Syr. (in Lexx) 9uwqbro0, 0agbro0 (PS:22); Ar. 9aka0biru pl. mares murum Frey (Kam), cf. also Hom:As 338; Ar. of jerboa RS:K 302; v. Tristr:NHB 122 FFP:10 ff.);—abs. ´[[הָע]] unclean Le 11:29 (H), Is 66:17 (cf. RS:Sem i. 275, 2nd ed. 293); pl. cstr. [[עַכְבְּרֵי]] [[זׇהָב]]([[ה]]) 1Sa 6:4, 1Sa 6:11, 1Sa 6:18; sf. [[חַלְמֵי עַכְבְּרֵיכֶם]] v:1Sa 6:5.
